description:
Simple steps before starting your business is an entry course for you to start your own business .


Simple steps before starting your business Cover :

1- Creating your business mode which give you the opportunity to convert your value to a profit.

2 - Business model prototyping to maximize your profit and reduce your cost.

3 - Overview about Minimum viable product which allow you to get a fast feedback from .your customer.

4 - Calculating your break-even point which determine your product price and let you know when will you make a profit.

5 - SWOT analysis which let you evaluate your company internally and externally.

6 - Overview about the marketing.


Simple steps before starting your business contain videos and article tutorials .


Simple steps before starting your business is designed for who don't have any previous knowledge with business to put them on the road .


Simple steps before starting your business give you an opportunity to gain knowledge about the following Keywords : Business model - Business model prototyping - Profit - Revenue stream - customer segment - Value proposition - Distribution channels - Cost Structure - Partners - Minimum viable product - break-even point - SWOT analysis - Marketing - Fixed cost - Variable cost .


After enroll in Simple steps before starting your business you will be able to Convert your value proposition to a profit using different ways - you can evaluate your business - Determine the correct price of your product or service - Get a fast feedback from your customer with a minimum cost - create your first marketing Campaign.


In Simple steps before starting your business we create a business model to organize our thoughts about the business and generate the largest amount of profit and make use the best out of our value proposition , minimize the cost and generate innovative ways to deliver our value proposition to the customer.


Creating a SWOT analysis , MVP , innovative business model and marking for your business put you on the top of your market.
title: Simple steps before starting your business
